pages.text: The world is set up in three stages, each signifying a different milestone triggered in the world.$(br2)The starting phase is normal difficulty where all mobs are normal and drop normal exp.$(br2)In this stage no one has gone to a different dimension and nothing will change.

pages.title: Expert Difficulty
pages.text: The world will enter Expert Difficulty as soon as a player enters a new dimension such as the Nether, End, Depths, or Sculk Depths dimension.$(br2)In this world phase mobs will be 20% stronger and Tank skeletons will start to spawn around the world. Along with the difficulty, mobs will also drop 20% more exp and have a higher chance of dropping more loot.

pages.title: Master Difficulty
pages.text: The world will enter Master Difficulty as soon as the Ender Dragon is defeated and will be very challenging.$(br2)In this phase, mobs will be 35% stronger and Cerebrus will start spawning natrually.
